name: Borb (JoeTheItchPro)
description:
The land has been plunged into darkness. No one knows why or how. 

It is believed the source of the darkness comes from an ominous stronghold.

You were tasked with entering its labyrinthian depths to seek out some solution to the oppressing darkness that consumes the land.

Will you be able to save the land from the darkness?

Perhaps you'll meet a helpful friend along the way... :)

This short horror game was made by a solo developer in under a month for a gamejam with the theme "Darkness and Light".

*One known bug: On rare occasion the player can get "stuck" when near a pillar that utilizes Borb. You can crouch to get unstuck.*
